text: @tom_fitzpatrick @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia Glad you‚Äôre all good mate. Have a Merry Christmas! We won‚Äôt let the Donkeys ruin it!

@CllrWarrenWhyte @EnvAgencyAnglia Good morning, despite the work we are doing, the saturated ground and overwhelming of the sewer network due to the excess rain, means that the water level is taking a long time to recede. We recommend flushing/showers/baths as little as possible for now, thank you. - Austin

text: @PoliceStow @SuffolkFire @EnvAgencyAnglia @Suff_highways I've driven off road on 3 continents with driver training from Land Rover & Jeep. Driving even the most rugged 4x4 through deep water requires special techniques, extreme caution and the sense to know when not to. I've seen highly experienced off-road drivers get it wrong.
